statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_information WHERE vendor_performance_rating > 4;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_information ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier_information ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM supplier_information WHERE vendor_performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_name AS Name, supplier_address AS Address, supplier_contact AS Contact FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%York%';
SELECT * FROM supplier_information WHERE vendor_performance_rating <= 3 ORDER BY vendor_performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM SupplierInformation WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM SupplierInformation ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM VendorPerformance WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT vendor_name, supplier_name, performance_rating FROM VendorPerformance INNER JOIN SupplierInformation ON VendorPerformance.supplier_id = SupplierInformation.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM SupplierInformation WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;

SELECT supplier_id, vendor_name, performance_rating FROM SupplierInformation JOIN VendorPerformance ON SupplierInformation.supplier_id = VendorPerformance.supplier_id WHERE VendorPerformance.performance_rating > 4;

SELECT supplier_name AS Supplier, performance_rating AS Rating FROM SupplierInformation LEFT JOIN VendorPerformance ON SupplierInformation.supplier_id = VendorPerformance.supplier_id WHERE performance_rating IS NULL ORDER BY Supplier ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance WHERE overall_rating >= 4 ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(procurement_amount) AS total_amount FROM procurement_decisions GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(decision_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 5 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors_performance WHERE delivery_time < 5 ORDER BY product_quality DESC;
SELECT s.supplier_name, p.procurement_amount FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN procurement_decisions p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id WHERE s.supplier_name LIKE '%A%' AND p.procurement_amount > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, AVG(product_quality) AS avg_quality FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN vendors_performance vp ON s.supplier_id = vp.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING avg_quality > 4;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT decision_date, decision_type, remarks FROM procurement_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance WHERE rating >= 4.0 AND feedback LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT s.supplier_name, v.rating, v.feedback FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN vendor_performance v ON s.supplier_id = v.supplier_id WHERE v.rating < 3.0 ORDER BY v.rating ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, vp.rating FROM products p INNER JOIN suppliers s ON p.product_id = s.supplier_id INNER JOIN vendor_performance vp ON p.product_id = vp.supplier_id WHERE vp.rating >= 3.5 ORDER BY vp.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT purchase_date, quantity, cost FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, overall_rating, delivery_time, quality_rating FROM suppliers s JOIN vendor_performance vp ON s.supplier_id = vp.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, supplier_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT p.product_name, p.unit_price, s.supplier_name FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE p.unit_price > 100;
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p JOIN purchases pur ON p.product_id = pur.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name;
SELECT p.product_name, r.rating, r.comment FROM ratings r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.rating > 4;
